jobs.title: Infrastructure Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

As a member of our infrastructure team with a focus on deployments and security, you'll ensure our systems operate with the reliability and protection that investment firms demand. You might be a fit if you...

  • have designed/implemented secure deployment pipelines in regulated, high-security, or on-prem environments.

  • are passionate about building scalable, resilient infrastructure

  • enjoy enabling workflows that enable product teams to move quickly without compromising security.

Join us in building the next generation of financial analysis tools that will transform how investment firms operate and compete.

 - have designed/implemented secure deployment pipelines in regulated, high-security, or on-prem environments.

 - are passionate about building scalable, resilient infrastructure

 - enjoy enabling workflows that enable product teams to move quickly without compromising security.

Join us in building the next generation of financial analysis tools that will transform how investment firms operate and compete.

jobs.title: Recruiter
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Recruiters at Endex build the team that's creating the future of financial analysis. You'll identify and attract exceptional talent across engineering, product, design, and finance to join our mission. You might be a fit if you...

  • enjoy story-telling and possess strong persuasive capability, such that you can convince high-quality talent to forego other opportunities in favor of our vision for the future of finance

  • have a proven track record of sourcing candidates for highly specialized technical and domain expert roles.

  • excel at building relationships with passive candidates from top-tier firms and organizations.

  • are skilled at designing efficient, high-quality interview processes that identify the right talent.

  • have experience scaling recruiting operations in a fast-moving startup environment.

  • are passionate about building diverse teams that bring different perspectives to complex problems.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, transforming how thousands of firms operate and compete.
jobs.descriptionPlain:

 - have a proven track record of sourcing candidates for highly specialized technical and domain expert roles.

 - excel at building relationships with passive candidates from top-tier firms and organizations.

 - are skilled at designing efficient, high-quality interview processes that identify the right talent.

 - have experience scaling recruiting operations in a fast-moving startup environment.

 - are passionate about building diverse teams that bring different perspectives to complex problems.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, transforming how thousands of firms operate and compete.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

Product managers at Endex define and drive our product roadmap. You'll collaborate with engineering, design, and domain experts to deeply understand the workflows of finance professionals across the sell-side and buy, and build products which users love. You might be a fit if you...

  • excel at translating user needs into clear product requirements and roadmaps.

  • can balance competing priorities while maintaining focus on high-impact opportunities.

  • are skilled at gathering feedback and insights to inform product decisions.

  • have a passion for creating tools that augment human expertise with AI capabilities.

  • are excited about working at the intersection of finance, technology, and user experience.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, transforming how thousands of firms operate and compete.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, transforming how thousands of firms operate and compete.

jobs.title: Product Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Why join Endex?

Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

About the role

As a member of our core product team, you'll help us revolutionize how financial professionals interact with market data and make investment decisions. You might be a fit if you …

  • have built sophisticated yet intuitive software interfaces.

  • have an existing interest in the financial domain.

  • want to connect cutting edge AI into practical, reliable tools.

  • are detail-oriented and committed to building powerful new products.

Join us in building the next generation of financial analysis tools that will transform how investment firms operate and compete.

Join us in building the next generation of financial analysis tools that will transform how investment firms operate and compete.

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

Data engineers at Endex build the foundation that powers our autonomous financial analysts. You'll design and maintain the data pipelines that transform raw financial information into actionable insights for investment firms. You might be a fit if you...

  • have built robust data infrastructure that handles complex, time-sensitive data.

  • have experience designing ETL pipelines and data models that support intense analytical workflows.

  • deeply care about data quality, testing, and monitoring.

  • are excited about working at the intersection of finance and data.

Join us in building the next generation of financial analysis tools that will transform how investment firms operate and compete.

Join us in building the next generation of financial analysis tools that will transform how investment firms operate and compete.

jobs.title: Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

Product designers at Endex craft thoughtful user experiences that make complex financial analysis accessible and intuitive. You'll transform sophisticated AI capabilities into workflows that feel natural to investment professionals. You might be a fit if you

  • are excited at the opportunity to set the standard for AI agent UX in the under-explored territory of financial analysis

  • care deeply about user research, iterative testing, and continuous refinement.

  • are passionate about bringing clarity, elegance, and efficiency to financial workflows.

Join us in redefining the future of financial analysis and transforming how thousands of professionals operate and compete.

jobs.title: GTM
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

At Endex, our GTM staff leverage their finance industry expertise to drive adoption, shape product direction, and build lasting client relationships. You might be a fit if you ...

  • have substantial experience in finance or investment management and understand the daily workflows of our target users.

  • are comfortable translating between technical and financial worlds to illustrate how AI drives concrete business value.

  • want to collaborate with engineers to ensure our solutions address real client pain points.

Join us in bringing revolutionary AI-powered financial analysis capabilities to investment firms and helping shape products that transform how financial professionals work.

jobs.title: Forward Deployed Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

As a forward deployed engineer, you'll help customize Endex to fit both the security standards and workflow pain points of our clients. You might be a fit if you...

  • are excited by the chance to speak both the language of technologists and financial analysts.

  • enjoy the technical challenge presented by the security standards of our clients - some of the strictest standards across any industry.

  • loves user interviews, updating your beliefs when the facts change, and doing whatever it takes to drive outcomes across an organization.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, that’ll transform how thousands of firms operate and compete.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker for financial services. We're recruiting a team to work on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs.

Backend engineers at Endex build the core systems that power our financial analysis platform. You'll design and develop robust APIs, services, and application logic that transform complex financial data into intuitive tools for investment professionals. You might be a fit if you...

  • have architected and built scalable backend systems that handle mission-critical transactions.

  • have deep experience with API design, service communication patterns, and database optimization.

  • are passionate about writing clean, testable code with excellent performance characteristics.

  • enjoy solving complex business logic challenges and translating them into elegant technical solutions.

  • are excited about applying modern engineering practices in a financial technology context.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, transforming how thousands of firms compete and operate.

Join us in building the AI-native workspace for finance, transforming how thousands of firms compete and operate.

jobs.title: Executive Assistant
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Executive Assistant to CEO & CRO - Endex

We're seeking an exceptional Executive Assistant to support our CEO and CRO, serving as their key strategic partner in driving Endex's executive operations forward. This position demands superior organizational abilities, confidentiality, and the skill to anticipate needs within our fast-paced, growing organization.

What you'll do

You will:

  • Handle executive communications and inbox management with the highest level of professionalism and discretion

  • Coordinate intricate calendar scheduling for both executives, including meetings, travel, and strategic engagements

  • Bridge communication between leadership, internal departments, and external partners

  • Craft and review professional corresponden

  • Coordinate domestic and international travel logistics with efficiency

  • Oversee vendor relationships and maintain office resources

  • Orchestrate executive retreats, leadership sessions, and company gatherings

  • Work alongside finance, legal, and operations teams on budget planning and compliance matters

What we're looking for:

  • Safeguard sensitive information

  • Full-time in-person presence at our New York office, including occasional weekends

  • 1+ years of C-suite executive support experience

  • Outstanding multitasking capabilities and meticulous attention to detail

  • Superior communication abilities

  • Proven track record of maintaining confidentiality

  • Expert knowledge of business tools (Google Suite, Slack, Notion)

  • Forward-thinking problem-solving mindset

Compensation and Benefits:

Our compensation structure is market-competitive and tailored to your specific qualifications, including:

  • Base salary aligned with experience and capabilities

  • Long-term incentives (company stock, options, cash awards)

  • Performance-based bonuses

  • Comprehensive benefits including:

    • Equity participation

    • Healthcare coverage

    • Retirement planning

    • Professional growth opportunities
jobs.descriptionPlain:
EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT TO CEO & CRO - ENDEX

 - Base salary aligned with experience and capabilities

 - Long-term incentives (company stock, options, cash awards)

 - Performance-based bonuses

 - Comprehensive benefits including:
   
   - Equity participation
   
   - Healthcare coverage
   
   - Retirement planning
   
   - Professional growth opportunities

jobs.title: Operations
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Who We Are?

Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker native in Excel. We're a team working on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs and backed by OpenAI ($14M Raise in Aug. 2025).

With over 10,000 professionals on our waitlist after 4 weeks, financial firms across the country know agentic AI in financial modelling is the future.

About the Role

Location: New York City

Commitment: 5-6 Days In-Person

Operators at Endex manage strategic initiatives, drive operational excellence, and own business growth. The role flexes across numerous high-impact, high-visibility workstreams, from leading GTM calls, hiring our future team, owning feature roadmaps, establishing new verticals and more. If you thrive in ambiguity and seek the opportunity to build the backbone of a transformational company, let’s chat.

Your Key Responsibilities

  • Execute Strategy: Work directly with the CEO to identify, prioritize, and drive forward high-impact initiative

  • Own Critical Operations: Ensure day-to-day needs across customers, partners, and internal systems are met quickly and effectively.

  • Shape the Product Roadmap: Gather insights from customers, evaluate workflows, and analyze the competitive landscape to inform product direction and strengthen Endex’s position as the premier AI Excel tool.

  • Support Go-To-Market: Join key sales conversations, build and optimize our pipeline systems, and create marketing materials and strategy to accelerate growth.

  • Explore New Verticals: Research and validate new markets and applications for Endex’s frontier agentic services, helping define where we expand next.

  • Recruit and Build the Team: Lead recruiting efforts, identify bottlenecks, and manage hiring processes to attract and select top talent.

What We’re Looking For

  • Athlete: You have a proven track record of excellence in fast-paced environments. You thrive under pressure, set a high bar for yourself, and are driven to help your team succeed.

  • Versatile Problem-Solver: You’re intellectually curious, quick to learn, and eager to take on new challenges across a wide range of responsibilities

  • Relentlessly Resourceful: Ambiguity doesn’t slow you down. You move fast, leverage your network, and figure things out even without a playbook.

  • Execution-Oriented: You translate company strategy into action by identifying, prioritizing, and driving forward key initiatives.

  • Organizer: You help set the company’s operating rhythm, designing and implementing systems

  • Strong communication: Collaboration across functions and teammates is core to Endex

  • Low ego: You listen actively, welcome feedback, and stay focused on outcomes rather than credit. You’re confident in your abilities but humble enough to adapt and learn.

Nice to haves…

  • Early-stage start-up experience

  • Finance experience relevant to Endex’s business

Full-Time Benefits

  • Health & Dental Insurance

  • Monthly Wellness Stipend

  • Retirement Benefits - 401K Matching

  • Competitive Salary + Equity

jobs.title: Finance Product Specialist (Full/Part-Time)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Who We Are?

Over the next few years, every financial institution will have teams of AI analysts working alongside their sharpest minds. At Endex, we're on a mission to bridge the present to the inevitable by building the most sophisticated digital coworker native in Excel. We're a team working on the frontier of agentic development and applied finance, in close collaboration with leading research labs and backed by OpenAI (Lead Investor in $14M Round).

About the Role

Location: New York City

Commitment: Part-Time (hybrid) or Full-Time (in office)

As a product specialist at Endex, you will play a critical role in ensuring Endex is the most comprehensive, and accurate financial tool across all financial sectors. Your scope will include ensuring Endex supports industry workflows intuitively and completely and validating Endex’s outputs to match the expectations of our strong enterprise pipeline. This role is available on a part-time, asynchronous basis or full-time in-person. In addition, this role can open opportunities to move full-time under various roles as Endex scales.

Your Key Responsibilities

  • Validate Output Quality: Rigorously test and evaluate the model’s financial outputs for correctness, edge cases, and domain consistency.

  • Investigate Errors: Diagnose model failure modes, root-cause them, and propose mitigation strategies.

  • Translate Finance Intuition into Product: Convert your real-world financial experience into heuristics, rules, or guardrails for model behavior.

  • Influence Roadmap Priorities: Recommend where to invest development effort (e.g. sector specialization, comparables, forecasting logic) based on user needs.

  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Work closely with ML engineers, data scientists, and product teams to align metrics, trade-offs, and UX.

You Might Be A Fit If…

  • You’ve held roles in investment banking, private equity, sell-side research, public markets investing (mid-cap or larger), or FP&A and strategic or corporate finance.

  • You have deep conviction about what “high-quality financial analysis” looks like and can spot when something is off.

  • You enjoy bridging domain knowledge and technical product design.

  • You like working in early-stage, high-ambiguous settings and want to shape how AI is used in finance.

Full-Time Specific-Benefits

  • Health Care - We offer comprehensive health insurance

  • Monthly Wellness Stipend

  • Retirement - 401K Matching

  • Competitive Salary + Equity

Join us in building the AI-native vertical finance tool, transforming how thousands of firms operate and compete.
